name: Wordy - Word Search Adventure
description:
All-time favorite Word Search puzzle game, the No.1 app for your mind! Simple, yet with a fun, new twist ON! Wordy gets you - and keeps YOU - hooked! Loads of wordy wonderlands!

Spot all the hidden words from a jumbled set of letters! Solve the easy levels, unlock the tricky ones with special words and collect the bonus points! Boost your brain power all while travelling miles & miles around the little-big world, through all the cities!

Are you ready to have fun while guessing the trickiest words? The wondrous road ahead! Get lost on the alphabet jumble and learn new words along the way!

FEATURES

• PLAY <- A perfect time killer game!
• It's easy, colorful, and fun!
• 500+ puzzles, from easy to tough brain teasers!
• Discover all the words! The letters are jumbled up.
• Can’t figure out the scrambled word? Use hints.
• Great for a quick brain warm-up or a full brain workout.
• Tons of exciting game levels and special modes.
• Earn extra points & bonus rewards.
• Play offline anytime, anywhere.
• Pass a bit of time, kill some boredom, get entertained on-the-go.
• Enrich your vocabulary, improve your spell – all at the same time.
• Absolutely no shortage of new worlds & places to explore.
• Play with friends! At parties, sleepovers, any time you get together.
• For all ages! Easy enough for everyone to join the fun, challenging enough to sharpen any wits.

Widen your vocabulary, train your brain and simply have a good time on the go!

Feel free to drop us a line: support@exosmart.uk.com
